campaignPreset.title: 2 - Veteran Player Preset
campaignPreset.description:
This preset offers the full MekHQ experience, with nearly all options enabled and balanced for a long-lasting campaign.

It's ideal for extended sessions against the AI using the StratCon ruleset but may overwhelm newer players.

This preset is Recommended for most MekHQ players.
